summary: A Flax-based foundation class for the Whisper speech‑to‑text model that encapsulates weight initialization, encoder and decoder forward logic, caching mechanisms, and optional gradient checkpointing, enabling both audio encoding and text decoding operations.
business_intent: To give developers a high‑performance, ready‑to‑use Whisper implementation in JAX/Flax for building transcription services, voice assistants, and other audio‑driven applications.
